alert.note: Alert for Crisp; Dodge; Dooly; Pulaski; Telfair; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 1:30PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Dodge, southern Pulaski, western Telfair, Wilcox, southeastern Dooly and northeastern Crisp Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 130 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms with very heavy rainfall was along a line extending from Tremont to near Union to near China Hill, and moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Cordele, McRae, Eastman, Abbeville, Rochelle, Milan, Pineview, Rhine, Chauncey, Pitts, Jacksonville, Union, Seville, Ocmulgee Banks, Finleyson, China Hill, Pleasant View, Tippettville, Godwinsville and East Crisp. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Crisp; Dodge; Dooly; Pulaski; Telfair; Wilcox
